description: Starting from Cameron lake, the trail follows the Mt Cokley (old CPR) route for the first hour, then branches off to the east loop of the Arrowsmith trail. This leads to a lookout point over Cameron Lake, the Strait of Georgia and mainland coastals mountains.
directions: Take Highway 4 east from Qualium beach and turn in at Cameron Lake park.  The trail begins at the gravel road on the other side of the highway.
title: Cameron lake to Arrowsmith east lookout
